Devin Cook

I am a Web Developer and Interaction Design Specialist. Recently graduated from Simon Fraser University with a Bachlor's degree in Interactive Art and Technology. I have a passion for combining beauty and function to create clean, inspiring, and responsive websites.

I built this portfolio web app using Angular and Angular Material.

Experience

Junior Web Developer (2014-Present)

Website On-Demand

Contract position. Responsible for developing websites, updating content, and designing graphics for 20+ clients. Tasks range from performing a complete site build to small updates and adjustments. I communicate with clients, as well as my supervisor, to make sure clients are happy with the work we do. Clients often comment on our level of professionalism and attention to detail.

Web Design & Marketing Coordinator (2014)

The Center for Epilepsy and Seizure Education BC

Responsible for the planning and development of the organization’s website, esebc.ca. Created sketches, prototypes, and wireframes to communicate my design vision. Developed a custom WordPress theme from scratch using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Performed Search Engine Optimization to improve search rank. Designed graphics and optimized them for the web.

Web & Graphic Design Intern (2013)

Downtown Surrey Business Improvement Association

Developed and maintained websites for the BIA, including surreymarathon.com, surreycitycentre.ca, surreyfest.com, and downtownsurreybia.com. Designed graphics for web and print materials (such as newspaper ads, logos, banners, posters, newsletters, and flyers) to promote events and campaigns.

Marketing & Communications Assistant (2012)

Simon Fraser University

Responsible for creating promotional web and print material for Health and Counselling Services. This included a campaign to promote a student health survey as well as updating the HCS website to use a new content management system. I also created 1-page information sheets, posters, and web banners.
